name: Michael Vesely
text: Absolutely terrible. Ordered a pizza and 16 wings online and arrived 5 minutes after it was supposed to be ready. Ended up waiting another 20 minutes (45 in total). They said they gave us extra wings for the wait but it was only 3 extra. Everything was cold and the pizza was doughy trash. I should've gone with Little Caesar's.

name: Reema Gandhi
text: This Papa John‚Äôs Store is only for Pickup. There‚Äôs no tables at all, all you need to do is just order either via phone or online & come to collect it.

name: Jantha Laemmer
text: Love their pizza! They cook pizza very quick and well! I even sometimes order myself medium size pizza and eat the whole thing by my self. It‚Äôs that GOOD!

name: Rebekah Olivia Marie Buss
text: Ordered pizza at 7:15pm. Wrong pizza order (had meat, I don't eat meat pizza) was delivered an hour later. Called to let papa johns know. Manager said I would need to wait 2 more hours before delivery of correct pizza order. Never offered a ‚Ä¶More

text: If I could give this zero stars I would. Ordered delivery to a business that is easy to find. Delivery was supposed to be 30 mins and an hour later the driver calls me and says he won't deliver because he can't find the place after I gave ‚Ä¶More

text: Let me begin by saying that I do like their pizza I just can't stand the girl who answers the phone.  Every time we order pizza and she answers,  she has a lousy attitude and talks to you as if you are bothering her.  You always have to ‚Ä¶More

text: Placed an order for delivery 45 minutes before closing. We were even going to pick it up but the website wouldn‚Äôt let us. They called me and let it ring once before hanging up on me and I instantly got an email stating my order was ‚Ä¶More

text: Called and was spoken to rudely.  I asked to speak to the manager and Antoine or Antawn said he was the manager.  Didnt believe it do I went in about 7 min later.  Was met by a different manager DJ who said he is just an employee and he ‚Ä¶More

name: alex haydon
text: Great service. Good pizza. Not too expensive. All the employees are super cool. Have to expect delays on weekends. No problem

name: G. Larry Xu
text: Love this place. Always had great ingredients and plenty. Warm and friendly staff who's willing to make adjustment to fit my needs. Candice was fantastic!

name: Eugene Johnson
text: Very disappointed in service received today. Heard a tv advertisement of buy two medium, 2 topping pizza's for $5.99 each. Called Papa Johns first to confirm it was there special. Nikki confirmed itcwas and asked for the order.Told her I ‚Ä¶More

name: Sandy Dryer
text: Great Italian food. You won't go home hungry.

name: Deb Robertson
text: Advertises they are open until 1:00 am and that they deliver.  I called at 11:50 pm and they refused to take our order.  I will never order from them again!

name: Jennifer Turnquist
text: Love their pizza. Fast friendly service.

name: Mr. Papagorgio
text: When hired Papa John's has specific standards employees must adhere to. Not at that location. Delivery drivers that smell like that they haven't showered, Mohammad. Management that deal with customers food having long hair, no hair ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim
text: The pizza was ok at best. Pricing that was agreed to over the phone was much higher at the store. I didn't say anything at the time bc I was not happy and didn't want to blow up. I will not be using this location again

name: Dorothy Capellani
text: a heck of a lot better than I thought it would be pretty good

name: Himanshu Jain
text: This outlet is not up to mark as other stores. Food is OK and customer service is terrible.

name: Candice Whetsel
text: The delivery guy who delivered on Thursday, August 8 to the Bloomfield West area was a very polite young man who was very courteous. One of the best delivery guys we've ever had.

name: Ken Frisby
text: It's Papa John's. It is what it is. etc. etc.

text: Terrible customer service. They delivered to my house three times. Today I make an order for some pizzas the guy takes my order an hour later I call back to see why it isn't here yet and they give me some bulkshit about they don't deliver to my area.
